La Pizza Napoli will always the best in: ingredients, flavor and texture. This is real Napoli styled pizza, so don't expect the same product that fast food chains will offer you. All cold dishes are great too. Wine and beer selections are very decent. Expect to pay 400 for 2 persons (antipasto, salad, main course, snacks and drinks) Recommended for...

The ingredients are of good quality and the taste is good, but the pizza has way too much sauce and the crust is thin so it's all very mushy.
